name: Invoke Chi-Ji, the Red Crane
description:
Summon an effigy of Chi-Ji for 25 sec that kicks up a Gust of Mist when you Blackout Kick, Rising Sun Kick, or Spinning Crane Kick, healing up to 2 allies for 5, and reducing the cost and cast time of your next Enveloping Mist by 33%, stacking.

Chi-Ji's presence makes you immune to movement impairing effects.
